import React, { useState } from "react"; import { AiFillEye, AiOutlineMessage } from 'react-icons/ai' import { useCallback } from 'react' import moment from 'moment'; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from '../utils/axios' import { useEffect } from 'react' export const PostPage = () => { // const post = 'res' const [post, setPost] = useState(null) const params = useParams() const fetchPost = useCallback(async () => { const { data } = await axios.get(`/posts/${params.id}`) setPost(data) }, [params.id]) useEffect(() => { fetchPost() }, [fetchPost]) if (!post) { return (

{post?.imgUrl && ( )}
{post.usename}
